item.title: Hugo使用html编写博客
item.description: 在 config.toml 中加入 [markup] defaultMarkdownHandler = "goldmark" [markup.goldmark] [markup.goldmark.renderer] unsafe = true 或 [markup] defaultMarkdownHandler = "blackfriday"

item.title: 爆零
item.description: #baoling { font-weight: bold; animation: animation 5s infinite; -webkit-animation: animation 5s infinite; } @keyframes animation { from { color: red; } 14.3% { color: orange; } 28.6% { color: yellow; } 42.8% { color: green; } 57.1% { color: teal; } 71.4%{ color: blue; } 85.7% { color: purple; } to { color: red; } } 又爆零了... 数论好难啊…

item.title: About
item.description: MrYaoxx Javascript console.log('Hello World'); C++ cout << "Hello World"; Java System.out.println("Hello World"); Go fmt.Println("Hello World");
